subject: Football
Hurricane Katrina
lead_paragraph: Two years after quarterback Aaron Brooks criticized the N.F.L. and the Saints’ team owner for failing to help the team cope with Hurricane Katrina, he’s out of the league. Was it something he said?
snippet: Two years after quarterback Aaron Brooks criticized the N.F.L. and the Saints’ team owner for failing to help the team cope with Hurricane Katrina, he’s out of the league. Was it something he said?
